name: Around [LD38]
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 38: A Small World.

Your goal in Around is to go around the world. And not die. Simple.

Most important features:

  • Limited resources (yay)
  • Totally random gameplay with minimal control over it
  • Completely useless day and night cycle
  • Ugly main character
  • No music
  • Stupid random events
  • Bad English translation
  • ...and many more!

Enjoy and post your highscores!

Also, let me know if you encounter any bugs.

Or do not. It has been almost one year since I made this and now I can say for sure that's the worst thing I've ever made. I don't want to come back to it, I want to forget about this disaster.
